document.full_text: forty years ago, divorced people were more concentrated in cities and suburbs. but now, for the first time, rural americans are just as likely to be divorced as city dwellers.
document.title: once rare in rural america, divorce is changing the face of its families
lines_and_colors: forty years ago, divorced people were more concentrated in cities and suburbs. but now, for the first time, rural americans are just as likely to be divorced as city dwellers.
